library(tidyverse)

Understanding voter behavior is crucial for effective political engagement and democratic participation. This analysis utilizes data from Gerber, Green, and Larimer's (2008) large-scale field experiment to investigate the causal impact of different types of social pressure postcards on voter turnout in the 2006 primary election.
